pages.text: This spell transmutes items into other items, although the exchange is often unequal.$(br2)Your held off-hand item is transformed according to a list of recipes when you cast the spell. All of the recipes can be viewed in $(uses:roots:chrysopoeia)JEI$().$(br2)$(warning) This spell has no modifiers.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:chrysopoeia/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.
